history.proof: induction l as [| y l0 IHl]. - intros Px Fnil. simpl. apply Forall_cons. auto. auto. - intros Px Fall. simpl. destruct (x <? y) eqn:Hxy. + apply Forall_cons; try auto. + destruct (y <? x) eqn:Hyx. ++ apply Forall_cons_inv in Fall as [Py Fall0]. apply Forall_cons. auto. apply IHl. auto. sfirstorder depth: 3. ++ apply Fall.

ctx: induction l as [| y l0 IHl].
exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

ctx: induction l as [| y l0 IHl].
apply Forall_cons_inv in Fall as [Py Fall0].
exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

original: induction l as [| y l0 IHl]. - intros Px Fnil. simpl. apply Forall_cons. auto. auto. - intros Px Fall. simpl. destruct (x <? y) eqn:Hxy. + apply Forall_cons; try auto. apply Fall. + destruct (y <? x) eqn:Hyx. ++ apply Forall_cons_inv in Fall as [Py Fall0]. apply Forall_cons. auto. apply IHl. auto. ++ apply Fall.
